scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "cd backend && npm run lint" "cd frontend && npm run lint"
